Package com.madrobot.reflect

Object utilities as well as classes that help with reflection operations on classes, methods, fields, enums.

See:
          Description

Class Summary
ArrayUtils Operations on arrays, primitive arrays (like int[]) and primitive wrapper arrays (like Integer[]).
ClassLoaderUtils A class to centralize the class loader management code.
ClassUtils Operates on classes without using reflection.
ConstructorUtils Utility reflection methods focussed on constructors, modelled after MethodUtils.
EnumUtils Utility library to provide helper methods for Java enums.
ExceptionUtils Provides utilities for manipulating and examining Throwable objects.
FieldUtils Utilities for working with fields by reflection.
MethodUtils Utility reflection methods focused on methods, originally from Commons BeanUtils.
ObjectUtils Operations on Object.
ObjectUtils.Null Class used as a null placeholder where null has another meaning.
TypeUtils Utility methods focusing on type inspection, particularly with regard to generics.
 

Exception Summary
CloneFailedException Exception thrown when a clone cannot be created.
 

Package com.madrobot.reflect Description

Object utilities as well as classes that help with reflection operations on classes, methods, fields, enums.
